name: 陳晏笙
objective:
1. Balanced Three-Phase Circuits
2. Two-Port Network Analysis
3. Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis 
4. Frequency Selective Circuits
5. Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
schedule:
Week 1	Introduction
Week 2	Balanced Three-Phase Circuits
Week 3	Balanced Three-Phase Circuits
Week 4	Two-Port Network Analysis
Week 5	Two-Port Network Analysis
Week 6	Spring Break
Week 7    Two-Port Network Analysis
Week 8	Two-Port Network Analysis
Week 9	Midterm
Week 10	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
Week 11	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
Week 12	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
Week 13	Frequency Selective Circuits
Week 14	Frequency Selective Circuits
Week 15	Frequency Selective Circuits
Week 16	Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
Week 17	Final
materials: Lecture notes available for download from 北科 i 學園
remarks: 若疫情嚴峻，本課程將採 Google Meet 線上授課 Virtual meeting room: https://meet.google.com/dpq-esiv-ivd
